backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request to add a founder image asset and update the FounderOwnerBlock component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short summaries of their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme tokens, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing header, four content sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Logo component rendering the company mark and name with tagline.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactForm: Contact form with validation, error messages, and a temporary success state.
frontend/src/components/site/FounderOwne: Component displaying founder details and photo using the newly added static image asset.
frontend/src/components/site/RoleDetails: Accordion for showing role responsibilities, tasks, and contribution details.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper applying spacing, container layout, and optional muted background.
frontend/src/components/site/ServiceCard: Card component showing a service icon, title, and description with hover styling.
Footer with company info, dynamic year, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
Sticky header with logo, smooth-scrolling navigation, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor, updating when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query backend hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useSmoothScroll.ts: Provides a hook that enables smooth scrolling to an element by ID with header offset handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, including light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge to merge class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/sections/ContactSection.tsx: Renders the contact section with company details, a contact form, and selling points.
frontend/src/sections/OverviewSection.ts: Displays the overview section with a hero message, feature highlights, and a descriptive paragraph.
frontend/src/sections/ServicesSection.ts: Shows a list of service cards detailing piling, breeze making, and general construction services.
frontend/src/sections/TeamRolesSection.t: Defines the team roles section using an accordion to present responsibilities, tasks, and contributions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for building a company website, listing features for sections like services, team roles, and contact. Notes a deployment failure due to a Caffeine configuration error.
